# IT Policies and Procedures

This document contains the official IT policies and procedures for the organization.

---

## 2. HIGH-LEVEL NETWORK OVERVIEW

### Network Architecture Diagram

```
                    INTERNET
                       ║
                       ║ (Fiber - [Speed])
                       ║
                   [FIREWALL]
            (Primary + Secondary)
                       ║
                   [Router]
              (Core Network Gateway)
                       ║
            ┌──────────┼──────────┐
            │          │          │
       [Switch 1]  [Switch 2]  [Switch 3]
       (Core/      (Building    (Building
        Distro)     A)           B)
            │          │          │
        [Access    [Access    [Access
         Layer]     Layer]     Layer]
            │          │          │
       (Users)    (Users)    (Users)
```

# Ubuntu Collaboration Framework

This document provides a detailed guide on how to apply the Ubuntu philosophy in practice during IT support and collaboration.

steps.description: Gather initial information about the issue
Test hypothesis and verify root cause

steps.reasoning: Fix issue and confirm it's resolved
Create knowledge for future similar issues
